i1.name: Bravado
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} After casting an ability, '''Taric's''' next two [[basic attack]]s within 4 seconds gain {{sti|as|{{as|100% '''total''' attack speed}}}}, each dealing {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|25 to 93}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 15% '''bonus''' armor)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and reducing the {{sti|cooldown|cooldowns}} of his basic abilities by {{tt|1 second|Affected by cooldown reduction.}}, as well as refreshing ''Bravado's'' duration on the first attack.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: After casting an ability, Taric's next two basic attacks within 4 seconds gain 100% total attack speed, each dealing Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version 25 to 93 (+ 15% bonus armor) bonus magic damage and reducing the cooldowns of his basic abilities by 1 second, as well as refreshing Bravado's duration on the first attack.
i1.notes:
* The bonus damage will not apply against {{tip|structures}}.
* ''Bravado'' can be {{tip|dodged}} and {{tip|blocked}} but it cannot miss if '''Taric''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}. The cooldown reduction cannot be negated in any cases.

q1.name: Starlight's Touch
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Taric''' stores a charge of ''Starlight's Touch'' periodically, up to a maximum at once. {{ai|Bravado|Taric}} empowered attacks grant one charge.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Taric''' {{tip|heals}} himself and all nearby allied champions for 30 {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|(+ 1% of Taric's '''maximum''' health)}} per stored charge at the time of cast, up to a maximum of 150 {{as|(+ 100% AP)}} {{as|(+ 5% of Taric's '''maximum''' health)}} at 5 charges.
q1.descriptionHtml: Passive: Taric stores a charge of Starlight's Touch periodically, up to a maximum at once. Bravado empowered attacks grant one charge.Active: Taric heals himself and all nearby allied champions for 30 (+ 20% AP) (+ 1% of Taric's maximum health) per stored charge at the time of cast, up to a maximum of 150 (+ 100% AP) (+ 5% of Taric's maximum health) at 5 charges.
q1.notes: * The healing will apply heal effects (such as {{ri|Summon Aery}}) prioritizing targets in '''Taric's''' circle, based on proximity to him, then in the {{ai|Bastion|Taric|Bastioned}} ally's circle, based on proximity to that ally (including it).

e1.name: Dazzle
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Taric''' projects a beam of starlight in the target direction, erupting after a 1 second delay, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|1.25}} seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml: Active: Taric projects a beam of starlight in the target direction, erupting after a 1 second delay, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.
e1.notes: * ''Dazzle'' will aim towards the target direction on-cast when firing from both his and his {{ai|Bastion 2|Taric|Bastion's}} positions.

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 50% AP) (+ 50% bonus armor)

r1.name: Cosmic Radiance
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Taric''' calls upon the heavens, summoning a star above him that descends down over {{fd|2.5}} seconds, afterwards bestowing '''Taric''' and all nearby allied {{tip|champions}} with cosmic energy, rendering them {{tip|invulnerable}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Taric calls upon the heavens, summoning a star above him that descends down over 2.5 seconds, afterwards bestowing Taric and all nearby allied champions with cosmic energy, rendering them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds.
r1.notes:
* ''Cosmic Radiance'' has no effect on {{tip|untargetable}} allies.
** It will affect the primary unit (the one the star is falling down on) even if they are untargetable.
